text: Birgitta Valberg Hansson (16 December 1916 - 29 March 2014) was a Swedish actress from Stockholm. She made 137 roles during her active years at Dramatens elevskola. She started acting in 1934 and retired in 1996. Valberg died from natural causes on 29 March 2014 in Liding√∂. She was 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1916 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Stockholm Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish television actors
title: Birgitta Valberg
